Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
Inventory
public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
Holds an array list of the tools that the tool shop currently holds in the inventory. Provides functionality for searching tools, along with extracting information and decreasing their quantities through sales.

Since:
2019-10-12
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ryan Lisowski (ID: 00257796)

    • searchToolByID

      public java.lang.String searchToolByID​(java.lang.String providedToolID, java.lang.String inventoryProcess, OrderRepository orderRepository)
      Allows for the search of a tool by ID.
      Parameters:
      providedToolID - The search ID for the tool.
      inventoryProcess - A string passed from the front-end that allows for a switch to take place to determine the next processing steps to take.
      orderRepository - An object that holds all order-related data.
      Returns:
      String A string containing information about the processing that took place for a tool.
